message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value the product at a higher price point. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $100?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?
